::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Wheeljack and then motions to Composer. "Wheeljack, 
this is composer. He's just joined the Alliance, and he's a 
strategist. I want you two to work together and devise a defence 
system for the waters around the island. There are already shields 
up, but good things to add could be torpedos, mines, possibly moving 
mines, and things like that. Wheeljack, you can use your 
technological talent, and Composer, your strategic talent. Do you two 
think you can do this?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Torca:::
> 
> ::Wheeljack receives Zardus' transmission::
> Wheeljack: I'll be right there Zardus.
> ::He walks to Zardus and Composer's position::
> Wheeljack: What do you need Zardus?
